answers.answer: Just Can't Get Comfortable At Night My Feet, Fingers, And Face Are Swelling! I'm Ready To Be Done!!!!
I am having severe sharp shooting pains in my back. I have also started having contractions in the front. I had this with my first. It is worse than actual labor contractions. -.-
Trouble sleeping, peeing a lot more, headaches, backaches, feet started to swell, and just a lot more tired in general.

Hands swelling, feet, back hurts, shoulder hurts, can't sleep, can't get comfortable, peeing more throughout the night, sore feet, pelvic pressure, and round ligament pains. I'm pretty tired too and out breath and energy but I'm bored line anemic so that's why.
Lots of vaginal pressure and cramps.37+3.

@jmb4611 my doctor said swelling in feet is normal but if you swell in hands,face and feet its not good and if you get headaches and blurry vision thats preeclampsia u might wanna check to be sure.Im 36 weeks 2 days.  I have swelling in feet. Still throw up in mornings sometimes when brushing my teeth.  Real bad pain in hips, lower back a vaginal area. Sharp pain in vaginal area. Sometimes I get high blood pressure. I got anxiety thinking about labor and just worry about baby and how everything will turn out. Ive been having contractions.  I pee soo much!Im one centimeter dilated and baby is head down already.
Lwolfe520,I Have Called The Doctor To Let Her Know About This Just In Case! I'm 31+2 Weeks And Have Tested Positive For Preterm Labor Since 25 weeks
And  Thank You For Being concerned :)

I am 34 weeks and I can't get comfortable, can't sleep, massive heart burn and acid reflux. Headaches/ migraines. Lower back pain. Hips hurt. Rib out of place. Feet swell. Pelvic pain. My son has been head down the whole time. I pee a lot day and night. I still have some morning sickness. I waddle when I walk.
Your welcome.  Hope everything turns out ok.
I'm 32 weeks and i can't get comfortable, i live in the bathroom now and i have to take at least a twenty minute nap in the afternoon ( not as bad as first trimester fatigue )
I'm 30 weeks and I have no symptoms besides my back hurts sometimes and I'm always tired. Plus I have to pee like 30 minutes.
I am 34 weeks 35 tomaro and I have been having trouble getting comfortable and itching all the time.
I am 32 weeks. Cant sleep more then a few hrs at a time, feet and hands are swollen and my boobs leak more then before.

question: For you mommies that are 30 weeks or more what are some symptoms you have ??
title: 30 weeks + mommies
